001package armyc2.c5isr.renderer.utilities;
002
003import android.graphics.RectF;
004
005public class SVGInfo {
006
007    private String _ID = null;
008    private RectF _Bbox = null;
009    private String _SVG = null;
010    public SVGInfo(String id, RectF measurements, String svg)
011    {
012        _ID = id;
013        _Bbox = measurements;
014        _SVG = svg;
015    }
016
017    public String getID()
018    {
019        return _ID;
020    }
021
022    public RectF getBbox()
023    {
024        return _Bbox;
025    }
026
027    public String getSVG()
028    {
029        return _SVG;
030    }
031
032    public String toString()
033    {
034        return _ID + "\n" + _Bbox.toString() + "\n" + _SVG;
035    }
036}
